about_the_game:
Shell Soldier is an intense first person game that takes place in a dystopian future.
Featuring frenetic firefights with a diverse set of enemy combatants ranging from tactics
to weaponry, and also a large variety of deadly weapons at your disposal.



Story
In the year 2052, After years of economic turmoil and rampant crime, The country
is now under the leadership of the security organization called " Armagate "

You, "The operator " is the latest agent of Armagate, armed with the latest genetic
enhancements and training, is tasked to stop the rogue group called " Silver Phoenix "
which is responsible for the countless acts of terrorism committed in recent years.



The game features
1.Chaotic gunfights: engage in frenetic firefights the would give an action
movie fan a run for there money.
2.An engaging story: You are tasked with a mission for the security
of your country. but the closer you get to your goal, the greater the
questions you ask your self as to why you are doing this.
3.Immersive graphics and sounds: everything in both the visual and auditory
elements of this game is designed to give the player a visceral experience of
frenetic firefights and the cold dystopian atmosphere of this world.

content_descriptors.notes: The player is going to be engaging in a lot of frenetic firefights that would result in a lot of violence , blood and gore scattered all over the battlefield. The story of the game would also from time to time deal with topics such as drugs use and self-harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: with a clock frequency of 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: with 128 MB of video memory and support for shaders 1.1
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 Gb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
